frqnt-flyr.title: Frqnt Flyr
content: Frqnt Flyr is a web app that allows users to review airlines
Michael, Eric, David and I made this
It was the first web app any of us had ever deployed
We made this app during our time at Launch Academy for a group project
We used the CarrierWave gem with Amazon S3 for file upload and incorporated pagination into a Ruby on Rails web app with a PostgresSQL database
For styling, we used Foundation with custom Sass
You can click here to see the app for yourself
To see the source code on Github, click here
